name: Caves of Eternity
description:
Coral is an adventurer who explores the endless sea in search of treasure, one day she stumbles upon a mysterious cave full of dangers. She's has a chilling sense of Déjà vu ...

Controls: Space Bar: Confirm WASD: Move Arrow Keys: Shoot

Team Members:
- Anter - Programming, Game Design
- Tuinteeru - Sprites, Character Design/Art
- Franopx - Additional Art/Sprites
- MARROW - Music and SFX
Made for Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam

OTHER CREDITS:

Fonts Used:
- Alagard
- Dogica
- Press Start
